dublinCore.dc:title: HR 657 ENR: Follow the Rules Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.congress: One Hundred Fifteenth Congress of the United States of America
form.enrolled-dateline: Begun and held at the City of Washington on Tuesday, the third day of January, two thousand and seventeen
form.official-title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to extend certain protections against prohibited personnel practices, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Follow the Rules Act.

section.header: Prohibited personnel action based on ordering individual to violate rule or regulation

subsection.text: Subparagraph (D) of section 2302(b)(9) of title 5, United States Code, is amended by inserting , rule, or regulation after law.
Such subparagraph is further amended by striking for.

attestation-group.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives.
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate.
